txt.en: There are many rewards that await those who participate in the Harvest Festival, and for those that harvest for many days, the rewards are all the grander!

'Sixteen days of harvesting, goodness me!

Bingo rummages around and hands you a large bag.

'You've gathered so much for the harvest, and for that you've earned the greatest reward of all, my friend!'

Every day there is something to do during the Harvest Festival.  Come and join everyone at the Party Tree, in Wistmead, and in housing neighbourhoods, and participate in many Harvest Festival activities for four days!

'Sixteen days of harvesting, goodness me!

Rosa rummages around and hands you a large bag.

'You've gathered so much for the harvest, and for that you've earned the greatest reward of all, my friend!'

Every day there is something to do during the Harvest Festival.  Come and join everyone at the Party Tree, in Wistmead, and in housing neighbourhoods, and participate in many Harvest Festival activities for four days!
Rosa can be found near the Party Tree and in Wistmead.\n\nRosa Hornblower would like to thank you for your continued participation in the Harvest Festival.
Harvest is a season of gathering, and those who gather the most often find that they are rewarded for providing the most cheer to their neighbours.
Complete 'A Spirited Harvest' four more times
